#include <iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<climits>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#define lld long long
#define MOD 1000000007
#define NIL -1

using namespace std;

#define pf printf
#define sf scanf
#define forN(i, n) for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define forab(i, a, b) for(i = a; i <= b; i++)
typedef pair<int,int> PII;
typedef pair<double, double> PDD;
typedef vector<int> VI;

//int i, j;
struct compFunction
{
    inline bool operator()( int a, int b ) const
    {
        return a > b;
    }
};

lld GCD(lld a, lld b)
{
    if(b == 0)
        return a;
    else
        return GCD(b, a % b);
}

lld gcd;
bool checkAAllPrimesB(lld A, lld B)
{
    if(B == 1)
        return true;
    gcd = GCD(A, B);
    if(gcd == 1)
        return false;
    return checkAAllPrimesB(A, B/gcd);
}

int main()
{
    int T, t;
    bool ans;
    lld A, B;
    sf("%d", &T);
    forab(t, 1, T)
    {
        sf("%lld %lld", &A, &B);
        ans = checkAAllPrimesB(A, B);
        if(ans == true)
        {
            pf("Yes\n");
        }
        else
        {
            pf("No\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
